projects.title: NASA MUREP MINDS
projects.description: Founded Science and Technology Applications for Research in Space at home institution, leading a private 10-student, 3-faculty research team for NASAâ€™s Artemis mission. Conceptualized fixed LIDAR data collection device to employ at a lunar south pole location for slope computation, elevation modeling, and autonomous vehicle training, emphasizing field-of-view perspective data. Secured $1,500 in funding from NASA to support research initiative following a research proposal

projects.title: Nasa JPL Scraper
projects.description: This Python script scrapes images from the NASA Jet Propulsion Laboratory (JPL) website using BeautifulSoup4 (bs4) library.

projects.title: Lapses
projects.description: DCGAN to generate synthetic images to destroy the model to represent loss of cognitive function (Dementia). Collaborated with Neuroscience Professor & other esteemed faculty members at my university to apply ML techniques to scientifically construct and accurately represent the project and optimize the model. Utilized Python, Keras, scikit-image, TensorFlow, and NumPy. Developed web scraper for the training dataset.

projects.title: CourseRank
projects.description: Implemented custom BM25 ranking algorithm in Python using Pandas, NumPy, and Jupyter Notebook. Optimized to rank courses at Dominican University based on description relevancy given query.

projects.title: FBI Wanted Analysis
projects.description: Used FBI's API to apply SNA & Clustering in Python to uncover patterns in criminal activity. Data cleaning and processing to analyze data using Pandas, NumPy, NetworkX.

projects.title: CCC Social Network Scraper
projects.description: Columbia College Chicago (CCC) - Designed & Tested Python web scraper using Selenium automation. Retrieves student data from my institution's social network and stored in a CSV file. Discovered and exposed a series of vulnerabilities previously unknown and worked with responsible vendors to fix.

projects.title: UA Safety (Contributor)
projects.description: A global website containing vital information for Ukrainian refugees. Implemented and updated website translations using JavaScript along with minor refactoring in the backend. Documented border and refugee information for other developers to reference.

projects.title: Ternel
projects.description: A collection library of solutions and approaches to algorithmic and mathematical problems written in C# and Java.

projects.title: WPF Interactive Game
projects.description: UI oriented game designed and implemented in WPF using C#. Designed 2D elements using Figma. Highlight consists of an installation and removal of inventory elements to be dynamically handled.

projects.title: Pixel Manipulation
projects.description: Pixel manipulation application in Python using Pillow. Utilizes a single versatile function that manipulates RGB values in an image.
